skills.title: Hardware Design
skills.desc: Experience in PCB design and using Altium Designer for University of Waterloo's Formula Electric Design Team. Projects include designing a Blinking LED 555 timer PCB.

skills.title: Embedded Software Development
skills.desc:
Experience in programming microcontrollers using
C++ and Python. Expertise in developing smaller
and larger scale projects with the Arduino and STM32. Experience includes developing firmware for the University of Waterloo's Formula Electric Design Team.

skills.title: Full Stack Development and AI
skills.desc:
Proficient in developing clean front-end and
backend custom web applications using HTML, CSS, JS, React, and Node.js. Also have expertise in computer vision and machine learning using Python and OpenCV.

skills.title: Mechanical Design
skills.desc: Experience in designing with CAD tools such as AutoCAD and SolidWorks. Expertise in engineering sketches and design processes using industry standards.

portfolio.title: Posture Pal
portfolio.desc:
Bad form in the gym is the worst. Posture Pal is here to help.

Technologies used: C++, ESP32, JSON, JS, React Native, CSS, HTML, MongoDB

portfolio.title: TrackMyThreads
portfolio.desc:
Ever had a hard time keeping track of what clothes need to be washed each week? TrackMyThread solves that.

Technologies used: Python, Flask, SQLite, React Native, Expo, Figma, NodeJS, TypeScript, ESP32, C++, OpenCV, Roboflow

portfolio.title: MindSync
portfolio.desc:
Mental health is arguably the single most important aspect of a person's life. However, some people struggle with therapy due to various issues. MindSync is a product that uses EEG technology to help therapists understand a patient's emotions.

Technologies used: Python, Cohere API, EEG, JavaScript, React, NodeJS, HTML, CSS.

portfolio.title: VerifAI
portfolio.desc:
With the rise of powerful ideo creation model like Google Veo, we are dangerously close to an online misinformation epidemic. Stay informed with VerifAI and protect your sanity.

Technologies used: Google Gemini API, NewsAPI, Python, React, Figma, NodeJS, Express, TypeScript, HTML, CSS

portfolio.title: SAGE-Rover
portfolio.desc:
SAGE-Rover is a rover that uses AI to identify injured civilians and provide them aid after a natural disaster.

Technologies used: Python, React, Figma, NodeJS, Express, TypeScript, HTML, CSS
